OpportunitySite_PeaceTalks.questDescript.li: questDescription->[faction_leader_nameFull], [faction_leaderTitle] of [faction_name], has sent us a message. [faction_leader_pronoun] wants to talk with us in a nearby location.\n\nIt could be a great opportunity to improve relations with their faction and receive gifts, but beware - a poor negotiator can cause more harm than good and may even anger them.[extraLeaderPart][favorRewardDetails]
favorRewardDetails(faction_leader_royalInCurrentFaction==True,priority=1)->\n\n평화 회담을 성공적으로 마무리하면 [faction_name](이)가 협상가에게 적은 양의 개인적인 [faction_royalFavorLabel](을)를 수여합니다.
leaderRoleEffect->협상에 정착지 지도자를 보낸다면 다른 세력들의 존중을 얻을 수 있습니다.

LanguageData.OpportunitySite_PeaceTalks.LetterTextQue: [faction_name]의 평화 회담 제안이 만료되었습니다. [resolvedQuestName] 임무에 실패했습니다.
